  1. from cms.plugins.text import settings as text_settings
  2. from cms.utils import cms_static_url
  3. from django.conf import settings
  4. from django.forms import Textarea
  5. from django.template.loader import render_to_string
  6. from django.utils.safestring import mark_safe
  7. from django.utils.translation.trans_real import get_language
  10. class WYMEditor(Textarea):
  11. class Media:
  12. js = [cms_static_url(path) for path in (
  13. 'wymeditor/jquery.wymeditor.js',
  14. 'wymeditor/plugins/resizable/jquery.wymeditor.resizable.js',
  15. 'js/wymeditor.placeholdereditor.js',
  16. 'js/libs/jquery.ui.core.js',
  17. 'js/placeholder_editor_registry.js',
  18. )]
  19. css = {
  20. 'all': [cms_static_url(path) for path in (
  21. 'css/jquery/cupertino/jquery-ui.css',
  22. )],
  23. }
  25. def __init__(self, attrs=None, installed_plugins=None):
  26. """
  27. Create a widget for editing text + plugins.
  29. installed_plugins is a list of plugins to display that are text_enabled
  30. """
  31. self.attrs = {'class': 'wymeditor'}
  32. if attrs:
  33. self.attrs.update(attrs)
  34. super(WYMEditor, self).__init__(attrs)
  35. self.installed_plugins = installed_plugins
  37. def render_textarea(self, name, value, attrs=None):
  38. return super(WYMEditor, self).render(name, value, attrs)
  40. def render_additions(self, name, value, attrs=None):
  41. language = get_language().split('-')[0]
  42. context = {
  43. 'name': name,
  44. 'language': language,
  45. 'STATIC_URL': settings.STATIC_URL,
  46. 'WYM_TOOLS': mark_safe(text_settings.WYM_TOOLS),
  47. 'WYM_CONTAINERS': mark_safe(text_settings.WYM_CONTAINERS),
  48. 'WYM_CLASSES': mark_safe(text_settings.WYM_CLASSES),
  49. 'WYM_STYLES': mark_safe(text_settings.WYM_STYLES),
  50. 'WYM_STYLESHEET': mark_safe(text_settings.WYM_STYLESHEET),
  51. 'installed_plugins': self.installed_plugins,
  52. }
  53. return mark_safe(render_to_string(
  54. 'cms/plugins/widgets/wymeditor.html', context))
  56. def render(self, name, value, attrs=None):
  57. return self.render_textarea(name, value, attrs) + \
  58. self.render_additions(name, value, attrs)
